rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0001
rows.name: Ahh... What a spectacular view.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0002
rows.name:
I can't help but wonder how such
a structure was even built.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0003
rows.name: Ngh...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0004
rows.name:
This place is pretty tough
on Blades, isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0005
rows.name:
I feel you, girl. This place is
pretty tough on Blades...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0006
rows.name:
This place is difficult for you
Blades, is it not?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0007
rows.name:
This place is tough on you Blades, huh?
It gets to me too, y'know.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0008
rows.name:
No, not at all!
This is nothing I can't bear.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0009
rows.name: Seriously though, Tokiha, are you okay?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0010
rows.name: Come on, Tokiha. Don't push yourself.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0011
rows.name:
You seem to be struggling quite
a bit from what I can see...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0012
rows.name:
Yeah, but that's just stubbornness
talking, right? You can't fool me.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0013
rows.name: I said...I'm fine!

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0014
rows.name:
Why did you want to come to
a place like this, anyway?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0015
rows.name:
Seriously though, why'd you even want
to come to a place like this?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0016
rows.name:
At any rate, why did you want
to come to a place like this?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0017
rows.name:
Why'd you want to come here in
the first place, anyway?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0018
rows.name: Well... Why do you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0019
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0020
rows.name: You wanted to meet the hero Adel?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0021
rows.name: You just...like being in pain?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0022
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0023
rows.name: You want to meet the hero, Adel?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0024
rows.name: You just...enjoy pain or something?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0025
rows.name: What shall I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0026
rows.name: You wish to meet the hero Adel?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0027
rows.name: You enjoy being in pain?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0028
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0029
rows.name: You wanted to meet Adel, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0030
rows.name: You just like being in pain, don't'cha?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0101
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0102
rows.name:
Well, to be more precise, I wanted to
learn more about him.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0201
rows.name: What...?!

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0202
rows.name:
Don't misunderstand!
Some may feel that way, but
I am definitely not one of them.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0203
rows.name:
I won't deny that being here causes
me untold physical suffering...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0204
rows.name:
And yes, I may accept this
willingly as a trial to endure...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0205
rows.name:
But that does not mean I derive
any...enjoyment from it!

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0206
rows.name: Urnghh!

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0207
rows.name:
Oh, gotcha.
But then why WOULD you come here?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0208
rows.name:
O-okay, good. Just checking.
Why DID you want to come here, then?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0209
rows.name:
I did think it seemed like a long shot.
Why did you want to come here, then?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0210
rows.name:
Not a deviant, eh? Could've fooled me.
What DID you come here for, then?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0211
rows.name: Well...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0212
rows.name:
I was hoping to learn more
about the hero Adel.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0301
rows.name:
Homura and Hikari and Kagutsuchi...
Not to mention Shin and Metsu...
They all have links to Adel.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0302
rows.name:
So I thought by learning about the past,
I could understand the present.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0303
rows.name:
Perhaps the deeper reason behind
the conflict we find ourselves in
lies in the depths of history.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0304
rows.name:
If I could learn of that reason, it would
help me discern my true foe and strike
them down without hesitation.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0305
rows.name:
You're too serious, Tokiha.
There's no need to take it that far.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0306
rows.name:
Tokiha, you're too serious.
You need to relax about things...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0307
rows.name:
It is possible to be too serious about
things, you know. Food for thought.
What you are doing is not normal.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0308
rows.name:
You ever think you might be too serious
about stuff, huh, Tokiha? And I mean,
like, ALL stuff...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0309
rows.name: Oh, I only do what I feel I must!

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0310
rows.name:
To be my Driver's sword and shield
is the calling of any Blade!

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0311
rows.name:
So I want to have as much clarity
in my purpose as possible.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0312
rows.name:
Now, shall we explore these
caverns a little more?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0313
rows.name: Nghh...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0314
rows.name:
Please, don't worry about me.
Let's keep moving!

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0315
rows.name:
I can't help but admire
Tokiha's determination...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0316
rows.name:
But even so, we should probably
call it a day for now.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0317
rows.name:
It's great that Tokiha's
so determined and all...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0318
rows.name:
But I'd better get her out of this
place before she actually collapses.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0319
rows.name:
I feel a new appreciation for
Tokiha's strength of will...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0320
rows.name:
But I think I had better stop her
before she pushes herself too hard.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0321
rows.name:
Tokiha's determined attitude
is pretty cool and all...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0322
rows.name:
But I think I'd better get her out of
here before she passes out.
